uws.job.serializer.filter

Class AfterFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uws.job.serializer.filter.AfterFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobFilter

    public final class AfterFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobFilter

    Job filter based on the start time. Only jobs that have started after a given date (not-included) are kept.

    Important note: This filter will also reject all jobs that have not yet started.

    Since:
    4.2
    Version:
    4.2 (10/2015)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (ARI)

        public AfterFilter(java.util.Date date)

        Build the AfterFilter with the given limit date.

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public final java.util.Date getDate()
        Get the date which filters jobs on their startTime. Only jobs started after this date will be retained.
        Returns:
        The limit date.

      • match

        public boolean match(UWSJob job)
        Description copied from interface: JobFilter

        Tell whether the given job match this filter.

        Note: In case of error while evaluating this filter on the given job, false will be returned.

        Specified by:
        match in interface JobFilter
        Parameters:
        job - A job to filter.
        Returns:
        true if the job matches this filter, false otherwise.
